title: Configure Renovate
body:
Welcome to [Renovate](https://togithub.com/renovatebot/renovate)! This is an onboarding PR to help you understand and configure settings before regular Pull Requests begin. :vertical_traffic_light: To activate Renovate, merge this Pull Request. To disable Renovate, simply close this Pull Request unmerged. --- ### Detected Package Files * `package.json` (npm) ### Configuration Summary Based on the default config's presets, Renovate will: - Start dependency updates only once this onboarding PR is merged - Separate major versions of dependencies into individual branches/PRs - Do not separate patch and minor upgrades into separate PRs for the same dependency - Upgrade to unstable versions only if the existing version is unstable - Raise PRs immediately (after branch is created) - If semantic commits detected, use semantic commit type fix for dependencies and chore for all others - Keep existing branches updated even when not scheduled - Disable automerging feature - wait for humans to merge all PRs - Ignore `node_modules`, `bower_components`, `vendor` and various test/tests directories - Update existing lock files only when package.json is modified - Autodetect whether to pin dependencies or maintain ranges - Rate limit PR creation to a maximum of two per hour - Limit to maximum 20 open PRs at any time - Group known monorepo packages together - Use curated list of recommended non-monorepo package groupings :abcd: Would you like to change the way Renovate is upgrading your dependencies? Simply edit the `renovate.json` in this branch with your custom config and the list of Pull Requests in the "What to Expect" section below will be updated the next time Renovate runs. --- You have configured Renovate to use branch `master` as base branch. ### What to Expect With your current configuration, Renovate will create 14 Pull Requests:
Pin dependencies - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/pin-dependencies` - Merge into: `master` - Pin [@material-ui/core](https://togithub.com/mui-org/material-ui) to `3.9.2` - Pin [@material-ui/icons](https://togithub.com/mui-org/material-ui) to `3.0.2` - Pin [@postlight/mercury-parser](https://togithub.com/postlight/mercury-parser) to `2.0.0` - Pin [cheerio](https://togithub.com/cheeriojs/cheerio) to `1.0.0-rc.2` - Pin [eslint-config-lemon](https://togithub.com/danielhuang/eslint-config-lemon) to `0.3.1` - Pin [next](https://togithub.com/zeit/next.js) to `8.0.3` - Pin [next-nprogress](https://togithub.com/sergiodxa/next-nprogress) to `1.4.0` - Pin [node-html-parser](https://togithub.com/taoqf/node-fast-html-parser) to `1.1.13` - Pin [node-vibrant](https://togithub.com/akfish/node-vibrant) to `3.2.0-alpha` - Pin [react](https://togithub.com/facebook/react) to `16.8.5` - Pin [react-dom](https://togithub.com/facebook/react) to `16.8.5` - Pin [react-fade-in](https://togithub.com/gkaemmer/react-fade-in) to `0.1.6` - Pin [react-md-spinner](https://togithub.com/tsuyoshiwada/react-md-spinner) to `0.3.0` - Pin [superagent](https://togithub.com/visionmedia/superagent) to `4.1.0` - Pin [superagent-proxy](https://togithub.com/TooTallNate/superagent-proxy) to `2.0.0`
Update dependency @material-ui/core to v3.9.4 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/mui-monorepo` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [@material-ui/core](https://togithub.com/mui-org/material-ui) to `3.9.4`
Update dependency @​postlight/mercury-parser to v2.2.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/postlight-mercury-parser-2.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [@postlight/mercury-parser](https://togithub.com/postlight/mercury-parser) to `2.2.0`
Update dependency cheerio to v1.0.0-rc.3 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/cheerio-1.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [cheerio](https://togithub.com/cheeriojs/cheerio) to `1.0.0-rc.3`
Update dependency eslint-config-lemon to v0.4.62 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/eslint-config-lemon-0.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [eslint-config-lemon](https://togithub.com/danielhuang/eslint-config-lemon) to `0.4.62`
Update dependency next to v8.1.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/nextjs-monorepo` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [next](https://togithub.com/zeit/next.js) to `8.1.0`
Update dependency node-html-parser to v1.2.4 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/node-html-parser-1.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [node-html-parser](https://togithub.com/taoqf/node-fast-html-parser) to `1.2.4`
Update dependency react-fade-in to v0.1.8 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-fade-in-0.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [react-fade-in](https://togithub.com/gkaemmer/react-fade-in) to `0.1.8`
Update dependency react-md-spinner to v0.4.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-md-spinner-0.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [react-md-spinner](https://togithub.com/tsuyoshiwada/react-md-spinner) to `0.4.0`
Update react monorepo to v16.12.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-monorepo` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [react](https://togithub.com/facebook/react) to `16.12.0` - Upgrade [react-dom](https://togithub.com/facebook/react) to `16.12.0`
Update dependency next to v9 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/major-nextjs-monorepo` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [next](https://togithub.com/zeit/next.js) to `9.2.1`
Update dependency react-md-spinner to v1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-md-spinner-1.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [react-md-spinner](https://togithub.com/tsuyoshiwada/react-md-spinner) to `1.0.0`
Update dependency superagent to v5 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/superagent-5.x` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [superagent](https://togithub.com/visionmedia/superagent) to `5.2.1`
Update mui monorepo to v4 (major) - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/major-mui-monorepo` - Merge into: `master` - Upgrade [@material-ui/core](https://togithub.com/mui-org/material-ui) to `4.9.1` - Upgrade [@material-ui/icons](https://togithub.com/mui-org/material-ui) to `4.9.1`

:children_crossing: Branch creation will be limited to maximum 2 per hour, so it doesn't swamp any CI resources or spam the project. See docs for `prhourlylimit` for details. --- :question: Got questions? Check out Renovate's [Docs](https://docs.renovatebot.com/), particularly the Getting Started section. If you need any further assistance then you can also [request help here](https://togithub.com/renovatebot/config-help/issues). --- This PR has been generated by [WhiteSource Renovate](https://renovate.whitesourcesoftware.com). View repository job log [here](https://app.renovatebot.com/dashboard#team-delta-v/News-451).
